tooltipContent.title: Orders
tooltipContent.text: View and manage customer orders. Track order status, process payments, and handle fulfillment.

tooltipContent.title: Channels
tooltipContent.text: Manage sales channels for your orders. Integrate with various platforms to streamline order processing.

tooltipContent.title: Status
tooltipContent.text: Monitor order statuses in real-time. Quickly identify and resolve any issues in the order process.
